docs.snippet: Although the average native of South America is now well disposed to the United States, pro-Nazi sentiment is in evidence in certain quarters of Brazil and Bolivia, Hubert Herring, director of the Committee on Cultural Relations with Latin America,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Although the average native of South America is now well disposed to the United States, pro-Nazi sentiment is in evidence in certain quarters of Brazil and Bolivia, Hubert Herring, director of the Committee on Cultural Relations with Latin America, declared here yesterday.
docs.abstract: Returns from 8-mo survey of Latin Amer; ???

headline.main: PRO-NAZISM IS SEEN IN BRAZIL AND BOLIVIA; Hubert Herring, However, Says Latin America Backs President

docs.snippet: For more than three hours yesterday 300 wholesale fruit dealers crowded the main salesroom of the New York Fruit Auction Corporation on Pier 20, North River, where the first large shipments of fresh fruit from South America this year went on the...
docs.lead_paragraph: For more than three hours yesterday 300 wholesale fruit dealers crowded the main salesroom of the New York Fruit Auction Corporation on Pier 20, North River, where the first large shipments of fresh fruit from South America this year went on the block.

headline.main: ARGENTINE PEARS GO ON BLOCK HERE; First Big Shipment of South American Fresh Fruit Sold to Wholesalers RECORD IMPORTS COMING 13,000 Boxes of Pears Bring $2.35 Average -- Nectarines and Grapes Also Sold

docs.snippet: The drastic steps taken by Latin-American countries to protect their exchange positions by curbing imports shortly after the European war broke out are beginning to bear fruit, according to credit executives of foreign trade establishments who...
docs.lead_paragraph: The drastic steps taken by Latin-American countries to protect their exchange positions by curbing imports shortly after the European war broke out are beginning to bear fruit, according to credit executives of foreign trade establishments who attended the monthly round-table discussion on credit and exchange conditions abroad at the Hotel Pennsylvania yesterday.

docs.snippet: A SERIES of Belgian parcel post stamps, comprising overprinted provisionals, which reached New York last week, has behind it a wartime story. During the confusion that attended the German invasion of the Low Countries last year quantities of Belgian...
docs.lead_paragraph: A SERIES of Belgian parcel post stamps, comprising overprinted provisionals, which reached New York last week, has behind it a wartime story. During the confusion that attended the German invasion of the Low Countries last year quantities of Belgian parcel post stamps were stolen from various postoffices.

headline.main: NEW ISSUES FROM AFAR; Postal Thefts During Invasion Result in Belgian Overprint Provisionals

docs.snippet: Last week's foreign exchange market duplicated that of its precedessor in continuing strength in the Chinese and Canadian currencies. Buying was in good volume in each, being sponsored by the political tension in the Far East which helped to lift the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Last week's foreign exchange market duplicated that of its precedessor in continuing strength in the Chinese and Canadian currencies. Buying was in good volume in each, being sponsored by the political tension in the Far East which helped to lift the Chinese units, while the Dominion currency rose on what appeared to be the collapse of the market professionals' interpretation of the Canadian Prime Minister's remarks on currency three weeks ago.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED FEB. 21, 1941
